We collect this Information: We collect Information about how you use the Service, your actions on the Service, any content that you may upload, post or share with our Service.
We may disclose aggregated information about our users, and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
Betts Recruiting, Inc. ( "Betts", "we" "us" or "our" )

This policy applies to information we collect on our Website, information you submit when you register with or use the Betts recruiting service, and the services, communications and software provided on or in connection with the Website or your registration with or use of the Betts recruiting service (collectively, the "Service" ).
Certain features of our Website may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from, and on our Website.
For example, if a user decides to refer you to our Service, we collect your name and email address from that user in order to follow up with you.

We collect this Information: We collect Information about how you use the Service, your actions on the Service, any content that you may upload, post or share with our Service.
Certain features of our Website may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from, and on our Website.
We collect this Information: From time to time, we may receive Information about you from third parties and other users.
We may also collect Information about you that is publicly available.

Introduction

Information We Collect About You and How We Collect It
We collect this Information:
We use Information that we collect about you or that you provide to us to: (i) present our Website and Service and content to you, (ii) register you in our database, (iii) provide you with information regarding employment and career-related opportunities, (iv) provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us, (v) provide you with notices about your account, (vi) carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts, including for billing and collection, (vii) notify you about changes to our Website or any products or Service we offer or provide, (viii) send you administrative email notifications, such as information about pending job offers, security or support and maintenance advisories, (ix) respond to your inquiries related to employment opportunities or other requests; (x) send newsletters, surveys, offers, and other promotional materials related to the Website or Service and for other marketing purposes of Betts, (xi) in any other way we may describe when you provide the information, (xii) remember information so that you will not have to re-enter it during your visit or the next time you visit the Website; (xiii) recognize and contact you across multiple devices; (xiv) monitor aggregate metrics such as total number of visitors, traffic, usage, and demographic patterns on our Website; (xv) diagnose or fix technology problems; (xvi) otherwise to plan for and enhance our Service, (xvi) fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it, and (xvii) for any other purpose with your consent.

Similarly, when you interact with us through a social media site or third party service, such as when you like, follow or share Betts on any third party social network, we may receive certain Information from the social network including your profile information, picture, user ID associated with your social media account, and any other information you permit the social network to share with third parties.
